verses.verse: And there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4397>angels<s%> to <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> at <S%H6153>even;<s%> and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom:<s%> and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H7200>seeing<s%> them rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> them; and he bowed <S%H7812>himself<s%> with his <S%H639>face<s%> toward the <S%H776>ground;<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> my <S%H113>lords,<s%> turn <S%H5493>in,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>you,<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> your <S%H5650>servant's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and tarry all <S%H3885>night,<s%> and <S%H7364>wash<s%> your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and ye shall rise up <S%H7925>early,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> on your <S%H1870>ways.<s%> And they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>Nay;<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> we will abide in the street all <S%H3885>night.<s%> <S%H7339><s%>

And he <S%H6484>pressed<s%> upon them <S%H3966>greatly;<s%> and they turned <S%H5493>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, and <S%H935>entered<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> his <S%H1004>house;<s%> and he <S%H6213>made<s%> them a <S%H4960>feast,<s%> and did <S%H644>bake<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread,<s%> and they did <S%H398>eat.<s%>

But <S%H2962>before<s%> they lay <S%H7901>down,<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> even the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> <S%H5437>compassed<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> round, both <S%H2205>old<s%> and <S%H4480>young,<s%> <S%H5288><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> from every <S%H4480>quarter:<s%> <S%H7097><s%>

And they <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3876>Lot,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H346>Where<s%> are the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> thee this <S%H3915>night?<s%> bring them <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> us, that we may <S%H3045>know<s%> them.
And <S%H3876>Lot<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him,
And <S%H559>said,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>you,<s%> <S%H251>brethren,<s%> do not so <S%H7489>wickedly.<s%> <S%H408><s%>

Behold <S%H2009><s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I have <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H376>man;<s%> let me, I pray <S%H4994>you,<s%> bring them <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you, and <S%H6213>do<s%> ye to them as is <S%H2896>good<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> unto <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H408>nothing;<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H935>came<s%> they under the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of my <S%H6982>roof.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5066>Stand<s%> <S%H1973>back.<s%> And they <S%H559>said<s%> again, This <S%H259>one<s%> fellow came <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn,<s%> and he will needs be a <S%H8199>judge:<s%> <S%H8199><s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> will we deal <S%H7489>worse<s%> with thee, <S%H4480>than<s%> with them. And they <S%H6484>pressed<s%> <S%H3966>sore<s%> upon the <S%H376>man,<s%> even <S%H3876>Lot,<s%> and came <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H1817>door.<s%>

But the <S%H376>men<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H935>pulled<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> them, and shut <S%H5462>to<s%> the <S%H1817>door.<s%>

And they <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H5575>blindness,<s%> both <S%H4480>small<s%> <S%H6996><s%> and <S%H1419>great:<s%> so that they wearied <S%H3811>themselves<s%> to <S%H4672>find<s%> the <S%H6607>door.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3876>Lot,<s%> Hast thou <S%H6311>here<s%> <S%H4310>any<s%> <S%H5750>besides<s%> a <S%H2860>son-in-law,<s%> and thy <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and thy <S%H1323>daughters?<s%> and <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> thou hast in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H3318>bring<s%> them out <S%H4480>of<s%> this place: <S%H4725><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H587>we<s%> will <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of them is waxen <S%H1431>great<s%> <S%H853><s%> before the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> us to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> it.

And <S%H3876>Lot<s%> went <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H2860>sons-in-law,<s%> which <S%H3947>married<s%> his <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>Up,<s%> get you <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H5892>city.<s%> But he <S%H1961>seemed<s%> as one that <S%H6711>mocked<s%> <S%H5869>unto<s%> his <S%H2860>sons-in-law.<s%>

And <S%H3644>when<s%> the <S%H7837>morning<s%> <S%H5927>arose,<s%> then the <S%H4397>angels<s%> <S%H213>hastened<s%> <S%H3876>Lot,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H802>wife,<s%> and thy <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> which are <S%H4672>here;<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> thou be <S%H5595>consumed<s%> in the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And while he <S%H4102>lingered,<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> laid <S%H2388>hold<s%> upon his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and upon the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and upon the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> being <S%H2551>merciful<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> him: and they brought him <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H5117>set<s%> him <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when they had brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2351>abroad,<s%> that he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4422>Escape<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> thy <S%H5315>life;<s%> <S%H5027>look<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> thee, <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H5975>stay<s%> thou in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3603>plain;<s%> <S%H4422>escape<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> thou be <S%H5595>consumed.<s%>
And <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H4994>Oh,<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> so, my Lord: <S%H136><s%>

Behold <S%H2009><s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> hath <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight,<s%> and thou hast <S%H1431>magnified<s%> thy <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H6213>showed<s%> <S%H5973>unto<s%> me in <S%H2421>saving<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5315>life;<s%> and <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H4422>escape<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> some <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1692>take<s%> me, and I die: <S%H4191><s%>

Behold <S%H2009><s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H8033>unto,<s%> and <S%H1931>it<s%> is a little <S%H4705>one:<s%> <S%H4994>Oh,<s%> let me <S%H4422>escape<s%> <S%H8033>thither,<s%> (is <S%H1931>it<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> a little <S%H4705>one?)<s%> and my <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H2421>live.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H2009>See,<s%> I have <S%H5375>accepted<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee concerning <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> that I will <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H2015>overthrow<s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H5892>city,<s%> for the <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

Haste <S%H4116><s%> thee, <S%H4422>escape<s%> <S%H8033>thither;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> any <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> thou be <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H8033>thither.<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H6820>Zoar.<s%>
The <S%H8121>sun<s%> was <S%H3318>risen<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> when <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into <S%H6820>Zoar.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4305>rained<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> <S%H1614>brimstone<s%> and <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H8064>heaven;<s%>

And he <S%H2015>overthrew<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H411>those<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3603>plain,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and that which <S%H6780>grew<s%> upon the <S%H127>ground.<s%>
But his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5027>looked<s%> back from <S%H4480>behind<s%> <S%H310><s%> him, and she <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H5333>pillar<s%> of <S%H4417>salt.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> got up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And he <S%H8259>looked<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> and <S%H5921>toward<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3603>plain,<s%> and <S%H7200>beheld,<s%> and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> the <S%H7008>smoke<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> as the <S%H7008>smoke<s%> of a <S%H3536>furnace.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3603>plain,<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the <S%H2018>overthrow,<s%> when he <S%H2015>overthrew<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H2004>which<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt.<s%>

And <S%H3876>Lot<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4480>Zoar,<s%> <S%H6820><s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him; <S%H3588>for<s%> he <S%H3372>feared<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H6820>Zoar:<s%> and he <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in a <S%H4631>cave,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> and his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

And the <S%H1067>firstborn<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6810>younger,<s%> Our <S%H1>father<s%> is <S%H2204>old,<s%> and there is <S%H369>not<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> to come <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> us after the <S%H1870>manner<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%>

Come, <S%H1980><s%> let us <S%H853>make<s%> our <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and we will <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him, that we may <S%H2421>preserve<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> of our <S%H4480>father.<s%> <S%H1><s%>

And they <S%H853>made<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3915>night:<s%> and the <S%H1067>firstborn<s%> went <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> her <S%H1>father;<s%> and he <S%H3045>perceived<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> when she lay <S%H7901>down,<s%> nor when she <S%H6965>arose.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> on the <S%H4480>morrow,<s%> <S%H4283><s%> that the <S%H1067>firstborn<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6810>younger,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I <S%H7901>lay<s%> last <S%H570>night<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> my <S%H1>father:<s%> let us make him <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> this <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H1571>also;<s%> and go thou <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him, that we may <S%H2421>preserve<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> of our <S%H4480>father.<s%> <S%H1><s%>

And they <S%H853>made<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H1571>also:<s%> and the <S%H6810>younger<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him; and he <S%H3045>perceived<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> when she lay <S%H7901>down,<s%> nor when she <S%H6965>arose.<s%>
Thus were <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot<s%> with <S%H2029>child<s%> by their <S%H4480>father.<s%> <S%H1><s%>

And the <S%H1067>firstborn<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H4124>Moab:<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> is the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H4124>Moabites<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And the <S%H6810>younger,<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1151>Ben-ammi:<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> is the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
